definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: I looksintosmine and see navel fluff, "said Barker, whose ambition is to collect enough navel pickings to stuff a pillow."
sentences.chinese: 他的志向是收集足够的软毛来填充一个枕头。

sentences.english: I look into mine and see navel fluff, "said Barker, whose ambition is to collect enough navel pickings to stuff a pillow."
sentences.chinese: 他的志向是收集足够的软毛来填充一个枕头。

sentences.english: The wind lifts the soft feathers on the little duck's head.
sentences.chinese: 风吹动了那只小鸭子头上的软毛。

sentences.english: "Cher said, 'I want a hot pink car with white fur trim,'" Barris recalled.
sentences.chinese: 歇尔斯说“我要有整齐白色软毛的深粉色车。

sentences.english: Inside the car, the grandfather took Huhu in his arms and stroked her soft hair.
sentences.chinese: 老人坐在车里，把虎虎搂在怀里，摸着它的小软毛。

sentences.english: Use a fluoride toothpaste and a soft-bristled toothbrush that fits your mouth comfortably.
sentences.chinese: 使用含氟牙膏和令你口感舒服的软毛牙刷。

sentences.english: There is also hard, soft, and medium.
sentences.chinese: 也有硬毛，软毛和软硬适中之分。
使用带有超软毛的牙刷。

sentences.english: Using acrylic paints on canvas requires applying the paint color with a soft-bristled brush.
sentences.chinese: 用丙烯颜料在画布上，需要申请用软毛刷油漆颜色。

definition: fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
